summary: Minions of Evil living space & Follwers
descriptionHtml:
Location (Whiterun)

Minions of Evil is a followers pack mod with a player house,the followers are all in Whiterun at different locations,the player house is a simple but compact farmhouse cell with access via a teleport for you and your follower.Each follower has is own perks to their skill and they are set at a reasonable level and equiped with their very own weapons.

Teleport Location to player house
-----------------------------------------

Shrine is on the right-side of the hall of the dead whiterun
next to front door as you face it (Check Pictures)

Follower Locations
------------------

(All in whiterun)

Mercenry Orc - Blacksmiths whiterun main gate
Vampire Thrall - Jorrvaskr Companions hall (Behind) below skyforge
Psijic Outcast - Sat on bench across from talos statue
Corrupt Nightingale - Sat on bench next to talos statue

Features
--------

Player home (Farmhouse Cell) Uses Teleport via Shrine to enter/leave
Smithing area & Supplies
Cooking area & Supplies
Crafting tables
Storage barrels (No respawn)
Storage chest (No Respawn)
8 Weapon Plaques
4 Followers in Whiterun

Followers
---------

++++++++++++++++
+ Mercenary Orc  +
++++++++++++++++

Level 30
--------

Skill: Two-Handed Bezerker

Perks:

Barbarian 5/5
Champions Stance
Critical Charge
Shield wall 5/5
Disarming Bash
Deadly Bash
Power Bash
Restoration Apprentice
Restoration Novice

Spells:

Disarm Shout
Healing
Race orc Bezerk

Weapons:

Daedric Greatsowd (Enchanted Paralyze)
Daedric Greatsowrd (Stamina Damage)


++++++++++++++++++
+   Psijic Outcast     +
++++++++++++++++++

Level 30
--------

Skill: Conjurer/Destruction Mage

Perks:

Necromancy
Respite
Regeneration

Flames
Icespike
Close Wounds

Iceform Shout

Staff of Chain Lightning

++++++++++++++++++

+++++++++++++++++++

silence

----------------------------------------------------------------

Thanks for looking and please check my other mods.
author: EvilMrPumpkinsNexus
